General.Name: Shanghai Chengdi Constr Co
General.Description: Shanghai CDXJ Digital Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the cloud infrastructure, cloud data service, and geotechnical engineering businesses in China. The company is involved in the production and sales of data center infrastructure; data center pre-planning and consulting; data center system integration; and data center sales, and operation and maintenance services. It also offers foundation and foundation engineering services comprising pile foundation, foundation treatment, foundation pit support, and other geotechnical engineering services. Shanghai CDXJ Digital Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Shanghai, China.
